name: Structured Output Parser
semantic_context: Return data in a defined JSON format
natural_language_description: 这是 Structured Output Parser 节点。主要用于: Return data in a defined JSON format

notice.displayName: All properties will be required. To make them optional, use the 'JSON Schema' schema type instead
notice.name: notice
notice.natural_language_description: 参数名: All properties will be required. To make them optional, use the 'JSON Schema' schema type instead

schemaType.name: schemaType
schemaType.description: How to specify the schema for the function
schemaType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema Type | 作用: How to specify the schema for the function | 默认值: fromJson
available_options: Generate From JSON Example (值: fromJson) - Generate a schema from an example JSON object
Define using JSON Schema (值: manual) - Define the JSON schema manually

jsonSchemaExample.name: jsonSchemaExample
jsonSchemaExample.description: Example JSON object to use to generate the schema

inputSchema.name: inputSchema
inputSchema.description: Schema to use for the function

jsonSchema.name: jsonSchema
jsonSchema.description: JSON Schema to structure and validate the output against

autoFix.name: autoFix
autoFix.description: Whether to automatically fix the output when it is not in the correct format. Will cause another LLM call.
autoFix.natural_language_description: 参数名: Auto-Fix Format | 作用: Whether to automatically fix the output when it is not in the correct format. Will cause another LLM call. | 默认值: False

customizeRetryPrompt.name: customizeRetryPrompt
customizeRetryPrompt.description: Whether to customize the prompt used for retrying the output parsing. If disabled, a default prompt will be used.
customizeRetryPrompt.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customize Retry Prompt | 作用: Whether to customize the prompt used for retrying the output parsing. If disabled, a default prompt will be used. | 默认值: False

prompt.name: prompt
prompt.default:
Instructions:
--------------
{instructions}
--------------
Completion:
--------------
{completion}
--------------

Above, the Completion did not satisfy the constraints given in the Instructions.
Error:
--------------
{error}
--------------

Please try again. Please only respond with an answer that satisfies the constraints laid out in the Instructions:
prompt.description: Prompt template used for fixing the output. Uses placeholders: "{instructions}" for parsing rules, "{completion}" for the failed attempt, and "{error}" for the validation error message.
prompt.natural_language_description:
参数名: Custom Prompt | 作用: Prompt template used for fixing the output. Uses placeholders: "{instructions}" for parsing rules, "{completion}" for the failed attempt, and "{error}" for the validation error message. | 提示: Should include "{error}", "{instructions}", and "{completion}" placeholders | 默认值: Instructions:
--------------
{instructions}
--------------
Completion:
--------------
{completion}
--------------

Above, the Completion did not satisfy the constraints given in the Instructions.
Error:
--------------
{error}
--------------

Please try again. Please only respond with an answer that satisfies the constraints laid out in the Instructions:
